entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 9:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: WSW 33 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then a few flurries. Blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
